pizzerias.name: Roberta's
pizzerias.specialty: Da Kine (tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, ham, jalapeños, Hawaiian sea salt)
pizzerias.description: Hipster-chic pizza destination in Bushwick offering wood-fired Neapolitan-inspired pies. Their Hawaiian pizza gets an upgrade with jalapeños and Hawaiian sea salt for extra flavor depth.

pizzerias.name: Paulie Gee's
pizzerias.specialty: Pineapple Upside Down Pie (tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, speck, calabrian chili honey)
pizzerias.description: Artisanal pizzeria serving creative wood-fired pies in Greenpoint. Their pineapple pizza combines sweet and heat with calabrian chili honey and premium speck instead of standard ham.

pizzerias.name: Emmy Squared
pizzerias.specialty: Big Kahuna (Detroit-style square pizza with red sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, bacon, jalapeños, ranch)
pizzerias.description: Detroit-style square pizza spot known for thick, crispy-edged pies. Their Hawaiian-inspired pizza uses bacon instead of ham and adds ranch drizzle and jalapeños for a sweet-savory-spicy combo.

pizzerias.name: Prince Street Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Perfection (Sicilian square slice with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ham, pineapple, Mike's Hot Honey)
pizzerias.description: Famous SoHo slice shop known for Sicilian squares. While their pepperoni is most famous, their Hawaiian slice gets an upgrade with a drizzle of spicy honey for sweet heat.

pizzerias.name: Scarr's Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Paradise Found (mozzarella, ham, pineapple, jalapeños on stone-milled flour crust)
pizzerias.description: Retro-styled Lower East Side pizzeria famous for using freshly milled flour. Their Hawaiian slice combines traditional toppings with jalapeños on their signature health-conscious crust.

pizzerias.name: Rubirosa
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Supreme (thin-crust vodka sauce, mozzarella, ham, caramelized pineapple, basil)
pizzerias.description: Upscale Italian restaurant and pizzeria serving ultra-thin crust pies derived from a family recipe. Their Hawaiian pizza uses their famous vodka sauce base and caramelized pineapple for elevated flavor.

pizzerias.name: Speedy Romeo
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaii Five-O (tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, smoked ham, wood-roasted peppers)
pizzerias.description: Wood-fired pizzeria operating out of a former auto body shop in Clinton Hill. Their Hawaiian pizza includes wood-roasted peppers for an additional smoky dimension.

pizzerias.name: Two Boots
pizzerias.specialty: Bayou Beast Hawaiian (cornmeal crust, tomato sauce, mozzarella, pineapple, cajun bacon, andouille sausage)
pizzerias.description: New York institution known for unique cornmeal crust and creative topping combinations. Their Hawaiian pizza gets a Cajun twist with andouille sausage and cajun-spiced bacon.

pizzerias.name: Artichoke Basille's Pizza
pizzerias.specialty: Hawaiian Artichoke (thick-crust pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, artichoke hearts, ham, pineapple)
pizzerias.description: Beloved late-night slice shop known for enormous, thick slices. Their Hawaiian variation adds artichoke hearts to the traditional combination for an extra flavor dimension.

pizzerias.name: Emily
pizzerias.specialty: P.H.O.a.T. (Pineapple, Honey, Onion and Thin ham on wood-fired sourdough crust)
pizzerias.description: Critically acclaimed pizza spot serving wood-fired pies and award-winning burgers. Their creative take on Hawaiian pizza adds honey and thinly-sliced red onions for complexity.

disclaimer: Information may have changed since the last update. Please check with the establishments directly for the most current menu offerings and details.
